call_summary: ADA Policy Violation - Agent apologized after ADA disclosure

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Richard. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to make a payment on my credit card.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I have a hearing impairment, can you speak clearly?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm sorry to hear that. Let me transfer you to our special services.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: This is not acceptable. I'm filing a complaint.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I understand your frustration. Let me see what I can do.
